title: Simple Calculator
description: Build a basic calculator that can perform arithmetic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
features: Error handling for division by zero
steps: Create a Calculator class with methods for each operation
Implement error handling for division by zero
Create a main function to test the calculator
Add user input functionality
Implement a simple menu system

title: Student Grade Calculator
description: Create a program that calculates student grades based on multiple assignments and exams.
steps: Create an Assignment class to store assignment data
Implement a GradeCalculator class with methods for adding assignments
Create a method to calculate weighted averages
Implement letter grade determination logic
Add input validation and error handling

title: To-Do List Manager
description: Build a console-based to-do list application that allows users to add, remove, and manage tasks.
learningOutcomes: Working with collections and data structures
User interface design for console applications
steps: Create a Task class with properties for description, completion status, and creation date
Implement a TodoList class to manage a collection of tasks
Add methods for adding, completing, and removing tasks
Create a display method to show all tasks with their status
Implement a simple menu system for user interaction

title: Number Guessing Game
description: Create an interactive number guessing game where the computer generates a random number and the user tries to guess it.
learningOutcomes: Basic game logic and flow control
steps: Import necessary libraries (dart:io for input, dart:math for random numbers)
Create a NumberGuessingGame class with game logic
Implement random number generation
Create a game loop with user input and validation
Add hint system and attempt tracking
Implement play again functionality

title: Bank Account Manager
description: Build a simple bank account management system with deposit, withdrawal, and balance checking functionality.
steps: Create a BankAccount class with private balance and public methods
Implement deposit and withdrawal methods with validation
Create a Transaction class to track account activity
Add transaction history functionality
Implement proper error handling and user feedback

title: Text Analyzer
description: Create a program that analyzes text input and provides statistics like word count, character count, and most frequent words.
steps: Create a TextAnalyzer class that processes input text
Implement text cleaning and word splitting functionality
Add methods for counting words, characters, and calculating averages
Create a word frequency counter using a Map
Implement sorting to find most frequent words
Add a comprehensive text statistics display
